annotations.description: I'm making a homemade copy of The Wizarding World's Pumpkin Juice AND inventing an alcoholic cocktail an adult wizard might make based on their youth. ******...
annotations.title: Pumpkin Juice from Harry Potter | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Juiced Pumpkin
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Cinnamon Syrup
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Allspice Dram
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Applejack

Shake & Strain
Garnish with Fresh Nutmeg & Cinnamon Stick

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kbk03UOrbYs
title: Pumpkin-tini
